parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Markers

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Moves the marker. If position is given in 3D format, <tt>z</tt> coordinate is stored with the marker and will be used when marker is passed to commands like [[createVehicle]], [[createUnit]], [[createAgent]], [[createMine]], [[setVehiclePosition]] for example. When [[Object]] is used for position, [[PositionWorld]] of the object is used.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> markerName '''setMarkerPosLocal''' pos

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> markerName: [[String]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pos: [[Array]] - format [[Position2D]], [[PositionAGL]] or [[Object]] (since Arma 3 v1.93.145584)

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>"MarkerOne" '''setMarkerPosLocal''' [[getMarkerPos]] "MarkerTwo";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setMarkerPos]], [[setMarkerAlphaLocal]], [[setMarkerBrushLocal]], [[setMarkerColorLocal]], [[setMarkerDirLocal]], [[setMarkerShapeLocal]], [[setMarkerSizeLocal]], [[setMarkerTextLocal]], [[setMarkerTypeLocal]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
